metadata.title: CVE-2020-23903 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A Divide by Zero vulnerability in the function static int read_samples ofSpeex v1.2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS) via acrafted WAV file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-23903` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspeex1 - 1.2~rc1.2-1ubuntu1+esm1
libspeexdsp1 - 1.2~rc1.2-1ubuntu1+esm1
speex - 1.2~rc1.2-1ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: speex package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2~rc1.2-1ubuntu1+esm1').
